short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some GitHub UI adjustiments, GitHub Refined Companion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install github-vscode-icons: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/github-vscode-icons/hoccpcefjcgnabbmojbfoflggkecmpgd to get icons from screenshot above.

- Adds Table of Contents to repository Readme (for now works only with root readme)

- Adjusts two icons: for README and CHANGELOG to make them more distinguishable

- Adds a few styles: makes icons larger (19px) and adds shadows to a few places in dark theme
- Adds so called folder delimiter. Useful when using icon theme

- Adds two global keybindings when file explorer is visible:

- P go to package.json
- E go to index.ts/js/tsx file

For now, the extension is not configurable in any possible way.
